name: Damage Reverse Hair Serum
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Scalp Treatments
about: What it is:A leave-in formula clinically shown to quickly repair damage and protect hair from future harm with a hair-identical protein..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.Key Benefits:- Reverses damage from cuticle to core.Highlighted Ingredients:- Alpha Keratin 60ku: A patented, 100 percent hair-identical protein that refills lost keratin to heal hair..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Packed with the highest percentage of Virtue's hair-identical protein, Alpha Keratin 60ku, this serum quickly repairs severed bonds that give hair its strength, restores damaged peptides to give hair elasticity, and refills each strand with keratin to smooth, soften, and protect from future harm..Fragrance Description:A rich, nurturing blend of creamy coconut and tropical yuzu extracts wrapped in warm woods...Clinical Results:In a clinical instrumentation study by Princeton TRI Labs, results included:

reviews.review_title: If you have any damage to your hair, you need this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Virtue Labs, The New Virtue Damage Reverse Serum is a revolutionary hair care product that aims to repair and reverse damage caused by heat styling, chemical treatments, and environmental factors. This serum is designed to nourish and strengthen the hair, leaving it healthier, smoother, and more resilient. One of the key ingredients in the Virtue Damage Reverse Serum is Alpha Keratin 60ku, a patented form of keratin that is derived from ethically sourced human hair. Unlike traditional keratin treatments that use animal-derived keratin, Alpha Keratin 60ku is a pure, whole, and intact form of keratin that is recognized by the hair as its own. This allows it to effectively repair and restore damaged hair, as it can seamlessly integrate with the hair's natural keratin structure. The Virtue Damage Reverse Serum also contains a blend of nourishing ingredients, including hydrolyzed quinoa, baobab seed oil, and grapefruit extract. These ingredients work together to provide deep hydration, strengthen the hair shaft, and protect against further damage. The serum also helps to seal the hair cuticle, reducing frizz and improving the overall smoothness and shine of the hair. With regular use, the Virtue Damage Reverse Serum can help to improve the overall health and appearance of your hair. It can repair damage, reduce breakage, and restore shine and vitality to even the most damaged hair. Whether you have chemically treated, heat-damaged, or environmentally stressed hair, this serum can be a game-changer in your hair care routine. Overall, the Virtue Labs New Virtue Damage Reverse Serum is a high-performance hair care product that is formulated to repair and reverse damage, leaving your hair healthier, stronger, and more beautiful. Incorporating this serum into your hair care routine can help you achieve salon-worthy results and restore your hair's natural beauty.

I tried this sample size. Itu2019s is very easy to work in from my roots to the end of my hair. I just tell dry my hair in the shower and add it on for a quick and easy routine. reviews.review_text: Love the rich and warm coconut scent. I used a couple times after washing my hair as a first step in my styling routine and noticed shinier, smoother and more manageable hair. I love virtue products and this one is a great addition to my haircare routine. Offered by virtuelabs

reviews.review_title: Improved the look of dry/split ends
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a deluxe sample prior to launch complimentary from Virtue in exchange for my honest review. I have long, fine hair that is not color-treated and tends to get dry at the ends long before they start to split. I noticed my ends looked more hydrated and sleek when using Virtueu2019s Damage Reverse Serum. I donu2019t notice any split ends in my hair after using this up, and they usually are more apparent when I heat-style my hair. I canu2019t speak to the long-term experience of using this product, as the sample I received had about five/six usesu2019 worth of the serum for my hair length.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine colored hair but a lot of it. Itu2019s somewhat dry and frizzy and I found a little bit of this product helps manage the dryness and frizz. It smells heavenly and doesnu2019t weigh my hair down. It does not leave a greasy look or a film in the hair. An absolute must in my routine.

reviews.review_text: #gifted_by_virtue   This is a fantastic hair serum!! Love how my hair looks and feels super smooth and is shiny and my damaged hair looks super healthy! I am loving the serum and canu2019t wait to try the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Virtue Labs. This hair bonding serum is so good. I really love that it is very lightweight and fast absorbing and it doesnu2019t weigh my very thin hair down. Smells very nice too. I think itu2019s worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this serum. It made my over processed damaged frizzy hair feel amazing again. I used a tiny bit on damp hair before styling. It sealed my dead ends and left my hear feeling to healthy and shiny.
